name: Turn Based Strategy Framework v2.1 - Demo Scene 2
name_original: Turn Based Strategy Framework v2.1 - Demo Scene 2
description:
This level was build with Turn Based Strategy Framework - a highly customizable framework for turn based strategies. It allows to create custom shaped cell grids, place objects like units or obstacles on it and play a game with both human and AI players. The framework was designed to allow implementing various gameplay mechanisms easily. Please refer to Unity Asset Store page for more information.

The level was inpired by Heroes of Might and Magic series. Assets used to create the scene are Aekashics Librarium - Librarium Bundle Ultrapack and Backgrounds by Kronbits

The level showcases some of the features coming to the new Turn Based Strategy Framework release. Spells were implemented with help of the Ability System. Spell targets are calculated flawlessly by the reworked AI. Turn ends automatically when player unit has no more actions left, another new Ability. Unit selection order is based on their speed, thanks to the new Turn Resolver. Finally, a different approach was used in building the scene - it consists of a background with an overlay of semi-transparent tiles, instead of being constructed from individual cells.

In the game you control elemental creatures and a Hero. Each turn you can use one of the creatures and cast a spell with the Hero unit. There are two spells available: area of effect Fireball that damages all units in given radius and Ligthning spell that jumps between enemy units, dealing progressively less damage. The game ends when all enemy creatures are defeated.
